Game: Barbie Fashion Show- An Eye for Style 2008-09-23T00:00:00-07:00 Barbie Fashion Show: An Eye for Style is a video game based on the Barbie franchise. The game is the sequel to the game Barbie Fashion Show. In this game, you play as a fashion assistant to Barbie, voiced by Kelly Sheridan and her best friend, Teresa, voiced by Catherine 'Cat' Main.
